articles.title: Shawn Mendes Has Canceled The Rest Of His World Tour Because Of His Mental Health - BuzzFeed News
articles.description: "I started this tour excited to finally get back to playing live after a long break due to the pandemic, but the reality is I was not at all ready for how difficult touring would be after this time away."
